summary:
Welcome to Ethereum - Ethereum is the community-run technology powering the cryptocurrency ether (ETH) and thousands of decentralized applications.

 What is Ethereum? - Ethereum is a technology that's home to digital money, global payments, and applications.

 A fairer financial system - Today, billions of people can’t open bank accounts, others have their payments blocked. Ethereum's decentralized finance (DeFi) system never sleeps or discriminates.

 The internet of assets - Ethereum isn't just for digital money. Anything you can own can be represented, traded and put to use as non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

 An open internet - Today, we gain access to 'free' internet services by giving up control of our personal data. Ethereum services are open by default – you just need a wallet.
